pages.text: Welcome to the Voodoo Manual. This book will teach you all you need to know about voodoo magic. $(br)To learn more about the practice of creating voodoo poppets you can head over to the chapter about them and start with the $(l:poppets/blank_poppet)Blank Poppet$(/l).

pages.title: Voodoo Poppets
pages.text: After you created a poppet you will want to bind them to a player. In $(l:binding)Binding Poppets$(/l) you can learn how to do this. $(br)Finally if your want to store you poppets in a safe place you want to use a $(l:poppet_shelf)Poppet Shelf$(/l).
